author: Chai, ZZ
adress: Huzhou Normal Coll, Peoples Hosp 1, Dept Gen Surg, Huzhou, Zhejiang, Peoples R China
title: Prolonged Capecitabine Chemotherapy Following Capecitabine and Oxaliplatin (CAPOX) Regimen Chemotherapy Failed to Improve Survival of Stage III Colorectal Cancer After Radical Resection
